dcterms:creator: Y. Hasson
G. Varol
D. Tzionas
I. Kalevatykh
M. J. Black
I. Laptev
C. Schmid
dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset consisting of 2,772 objects from 8 categories taken from ShapeNet, with 21K plausible grasps generated using GraspIt. The dataset contains 141K frames for training and 6K frames for testing, rendered using Blender on random backgrounds.
dcterms:title: ObMan

dcterms:creator: S. Hampali
M. Rad
M. Oberweger
V. Lepetit
dcterms:description: A real-world dataset that includes 77,558 frames from 68 sequences, containing 10 different objects manipulated by 10 different users. The hand and object pose annotations are obtained from multi-camera optimization procedures.
dcterms:title: HO3D

dcterms:creator: Z. Cao
I. Radosavovic
A. Kanazawa
J. Malik
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 442 images of 121 object templates, collected from in-the-wild sources such as EPIC Kitchens and the 100 Days of Hands datasets.
dcterms:title: MOW

dcterms:creator: Y. Chao
W. Yang
Y. Xiang
P. Molchanov
A. Handa
J. Tremblay
Y. Narang
K. Van Wyk
U. Iqbal
S. Birchfield
J. Kautz
D. Fox
dcterms:description: A large-scale real-world hand-object dataset focusing on right-hand samples, with 29,656 training samples and 5,928 testing samples.
dcterms:title: DexYCB
